#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 2000001
unsigned long long int a[MAX];
void init(unsigned long long int mod)
{
    int i;
    a[1]=1;
    a[2]=1;
    for(i=3;i<MAX;i++){
        a[i]=(a[i-1]+a[i-2])%mod;
    }
}
int main()
{
int t;
unsigned long long int n,m,up,down;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    cin>>n>>m;
    init(m);
    up=a[2*n-1]%m;
    down=a[2*n]%m;
    cout<<up<<"/"<<down<<endl;
}
return 0;

}
